article_title: HCA Hospitals in Good Shape Even if Supreme Court Takes Obamacare 'Apart at the Seams'
article_text:
7 Stocks to Buy for When Hillary Clinton Is President

Hillary Clinton has promised to be tough on Wall Street once she's in the White House, but there are many ways investors should be able to profit from her presidency.

article_metadata.description: Investors of regional hospital operators like Tenet Healthcare (THC), HCA Holdings (HCA) and Community Health Systems (CYH) look to the Supreme Court ruling in King v. Burwell.
article_metadata.author: Scott Gamm
